warning.title: Please Read Carefully
warning.text: This document outlines the nature of the Bufo Alvarius ceremony, associated risks, and your rights and responsibilities as a participant. By signing below, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to all terms.

nature.title: 1. Nature of the Experience
paragraphs: I understand that the Bufo Alvarius ceremony involves the use of 5-MeO-DMT, a naturally occurring psychoactive compound derived from the secretions of the Bufo Alvarius toad. This is a powerful entheogenic substance that can produce profound alterations in consciousness.
I understand that this ceremony is offered as a spiritual practice and personal growth experience. It is NOT a medical treatment, therapy, or substitute for professional mental health care.
I acknowledge that the facilitators are not medical doctors, psychiatrists, or licensed therapists, and do not diagnose, treat, or claim to cure any medical or psychological condition.
nature.checkbox: I have read and understand the nature of the Bufo Alvarius experience

risks.title: 2. Acknowledgment of Risks
risks.intro: I understand that participation in this ceremony carries inherent risks, including but not limited to:
items: Temporary loss of motor control and bodily awareness
Temporary changes in perception, thought, and sense of self
Physical reactions such as nausea, vomiting, changes in heart rate or blood pressure
Re-emergence of past traumas or suppressed emotions
Rare but possible adverse psychological reactions
In extremely rare cases, medical emergencies
risks.closing: I accept full responsibility for my decision to participate and understand that the facilitators cannot guarantee any specific outcome or the absence of adverse effects.
risks.checkbox: I acknowledge and accept the risks associated with this experience

medical.title: 3. Medical Disclosure & Contraindications
medical.intro: I confirm that I have disclosed all relevant medical and psychological information in my screening questionnaire, including:
items: All current medications (especially SSRIs, MAOIs, antidepressants, antipsychotics)
Any history of heart conditions, high blood pressure, or cardiovascular issues
Any history of psychosis, schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, or psychiatric hospitalization
Current pregnancy or possibility of pregnancy
Any other physical or mental health conditions
medical.closing: I understand that withholding or falsifying medical information could result in serious harm to myself, and I release the facilitators from any liability resulting from undisclosed conditions.
medical.checkbox: I confirm that I have truthfully disclosed all medical and psychological information

confidentiality.title: 4. Confidentiality
confidentiality.intro: I understand that my personal information, screening responses, and anything shared during sessions will be held in strict confidence by the facilitators.
confidentiality.alsoAgree: I also agree to maintain confidentiality regarding:
items: The identity and personal information of any other participants (if applicable)
The specific location of the ceremony space
Any personal details shared by the facilitators
confidentiality.checkbox: I agree to maintain confidentiality as described above

media.title: 5. Photography, Recording & Media
paragraphs: I understand that no photography, video, or audio recording is permitted during the ceremony without explicit consent from all parties present.
I agree not to record, photograph, or share any media from the ceremony or ceremony space without prior written permission.
media.checkbox: I agree to the media and recording policy

voluntary.title: 6. Voluntary Participation & Release of Liability
paragraphs: I confirm that my participation in this ceremony is entirely voluntary. I have not been coerced, pressured, or manipulated into participating.
I understand that I may withdraw my participation at any time before the ceremony begins. Once the medicine has been administered, the experience must be allowed to complete naturally.
voluntary.releaseText: To the fullest extent permitted by law, I release, waive, and discharge the facilitators, and any assistants, from any and all liability, claims, demands, or causes of action that may arise from my participation in this ceremony.
voluntary.releaseClosing: This release applies to any injury, illness, damage, or loss—whether physical, psychological, emotional, or material—that may result from my participation, regardless of cause.
voluntary.checkbox: I confirm my voluntary participation and release of liability
